entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, described as walking up the stone steps and staring at the newly materialized door.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: A person who pulls out his wand and taps the door to open it.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, described as having a cage.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A person standing on the top step and releasing balls of light.

entities.name: the put-out-er
entities.description: An object that stole balls of light from street-lamps.

relationships.description: Harry is accompanied by Lupin as they enter the hall.
Harry is also accompanied by Tonks as they enter the hall.
Lupin opens the door for Harry to enter the hall.
Moody releases light from The Put-Out-Er.
